mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, DETAIL = #{detail}, MODIFYDATE = SYSDATE, MODIFYNAME = #{modifyName} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (ID, TITLE, DETAIL, WRITEDATE, MODIFYDATE, WRITERNAME, MODIFYNAME) VALUES (board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{detail}, sysdate, sysdate, #{writerName}, #{modifyName})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY id DESC) WHERE 1=1 AND rownum = 1
